profile: Home Inspector, Home Inspection Proudly serving clients in the GTA and surrounding areas. DSM Property Services is proud to provide our clients with professional, reliable inspection services. All our inspections are conducted by a qualified and fully accredited Registered Home Inspector (RHI) and Certified Thermographer with over 25 years experience in construction and renovation. Our inspection services include: • Detailed Inspection of all visible structures and components of a home, • Infrared thermal scans* of non-visible structures and components to detect potential issues with moisture, electrical, and insulation • Use of the latest Inspection Technology • Repair and cost estimates • Recommendations and Maintenance planning • A fully detailed and easy to read report of all findings including pictures for quick reference • A reference library and links to more detailed information on the components of the home You also have the option to purchase a detailed Home History Report. *Infrared Thermal Scans are part of our premium package and are conducted to detect what the naked eye cannot. This process can identify potential problems in structure, electrical components, insulation, air leakage and moisture content. An Infrared Scan can: • help locate potential safety issues with live electrical equipment, • detect hidden heating and cooling losses, • detect moisture intrusion which could cause mould, • detect inadequate or non-existent insulation, • detect plumbing leaks and poor construction. • It could save you in potential repair costs!! Book a thermal scan inspection: * Before a warranty inspection * Before a Real Estate Investment * Before a contractor begins work * After a completed project * As part of a routine maintenance check on your home. Doing your homework on finding the right Home Inspector is crucial. You need to make sure you are hiring a qualified and experienced Inspector. After all, this person will be providing you with the information you need to make an informed decision about some very costly investments, whether it be the purchase or selling of a home, a new home renovation or existing repair, maintenance of your existing home or potential issues you are having. We hope that DSM Property Services Inc. can help you with your inspection needs! Please visit our website and our Facebook page for regular updates on home inspection and construction information! Like us on Facebook!
